summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1902, for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue Northwest, Seventeenth Avenue Northwest, and Eighteenth Avenue Northwest, each from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 19655, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
